question: Write a letter to a teacher asking for a reference letter for a job and explain:– Why you have chosen him to write the reference letter– What kind of job you are applying for– Why you think you are suitable for this job
text: I hope you are doing well. I am currently applying for an engineering job in Matcori, and I am wondering if you could write a letter of recommendation on my behalf.
As my professor on basic programming, I believe you could effectively vouch for the programming and problem-solving skills that I have demonstrated during our time together.
I am applying to be one of Matcori's Associate Programmers, which has been my dream ever since I started coding. If hired, I will be coding using Java and some technologies I have never tried.

I know this job is for me, I got the skills they need, and I think I fit with the culture they have. Thus, in preparation, I am reviewing all the things you have taught me, and I am also learning the new technologies that they are currently using.
If you need any additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me at 080-1234-1234 or [email protected]
I really appreciate any help you can provide.
